title: California Bans Plastic Microbeads: A Key Step in Reducing ... - NRDC
body: Plastic pollution—whether from microbeads or other microplastics, or from larger pieces of plastic—also poses significant risks to marine animals. Plastic ingestion has been documented in 86% ...
readable_content:
- Guest (2023-12-08): The article explains the ban on plastic microbeads in California and its environmental impact. The ban is set to take effect on January 1, 2020, and aims to address the issue of microplastic pollution in oceans. It also discusses the dangers posed by plastic pollution to marine life and human health, as well as the efforts of NRDC and other organizations to reduce plastic pollution.

The article provides insight into the impact of microplastics on marine life, the potential implications for human health, and efforts to address the issue. It also highlights the significance of common-sense laws like AB 888 in reducing plastic pollution in the oceans.
